title: Repeals article 21 of the tax law relating to imposition of a highway use tax for the privilege of operating any vehicular unit upon the public highways
summary: Repeals provisions relating to imposition of a highway use tax for the privilege of operating any vehicular unit upon the public highways of the state.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          606

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. MAGNARELLI, SCHIMMINGER, SCHROEDER -- Multi-Spon-
         sored by -- M. of A.  DESTITO, LUPARDO, McENENY, RAIA, SWEENEY -- read
         once and referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

       AN  ACT  to repeal article 21 of the tax law relating to the highway use
         tax

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Article 21 of the tax law is REPEALED.
    2    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.








        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03155-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal article 21 of the tax law relating to the highway use tax
